propositions.text: The story revolves around a modern woman, Mei Xun, who traverses to a female-dominated ancient world.
Mei Xun struggles with the cultural shift where women hold supreme power and men are subservient.
She adapts to her new identity as a poor woman responsible for her household.
Mei Xun forms an emotional bond with a young boy named Xiao Dou, providing him care and protection.
This relationship evolves from pity to a deeper, complex affection, challenging societal norms.
Daily life in the female-dominated society is harsh, requiring Mei Xun to labor and face social ostracism.
She uses her modern medical knowledge to develop herbal remedies, gradually earning trust as a healer.
A crisis emerges when bandits attack the village, forcing Mei Xun to protect Xiao Dou at all costs.
This event solidifies her resolve to defy societal rules for the sake of her bond with Xiao Dou.
Mei Xun envisions a future where she and Xiao Dou can escape prejudice and live freely.

concepts.name: Female Dominance
concepts.context: Central theme of societal structure where women hold power over men.

concepts.name: Time Travel
concepts.context: Protagonist's journey from modern to ancient world.

concepts.name: Emotional Bond
concepts.context: Developing relationship between Mei Xun and Xiao Dou.

concepts.name: Medical Knowledge
concepts.context: Use of modern medicine and herbal remedies to heal and gain trust.

concepts.name: Social Struggle
concepts.context: Challenges faced due to outsider status and societal norms.

hierarchy.structure: The document is organized into chapters detailing the protagonist's journey from confusion and adaptation to emotional bonding, societal challenges, and eventual hope for a better future.
